business_strategies.strategy: Three-phase progression: AI Automation Agency → AI Agency → AI Transformation Partner
business_strategies.implementation: Start with low-code tools, hire full-stack developers, then move to transformation consulting
business_strategies.case_study: Morningside AI's progression from $300 consulting calls to $100k projects

business_strategies.strategy: Start by helping people around you (family, friends) to build momentum and experience
business_strategies.implementation: Help dad, mom, auntie's business, friends with basic AI automations
business_strategies.expected_results: Gain industry expertise and become leading expert after 4-5 projects
business_strategies.case_study: Construction industry example - becoming pack leader in AI knowledge

problems_solutions.problem: Non-technical people can't access AI business opportunities
problems_solutions.solution: Use low-code/no-code platforms to build AI solutions
steps: Start with AI Automation Agency model
Use tools like Botpress, Voiceflow, Make.com
Build basic automations with AI integration
problems_solutions.time_estimate: few hours to build solutions worth $10-15k

problems_solutions.solution: Hire full-stack developers and move to custom development
steps: Hire full-time full-stack developer with AI experience

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Thinking you need fancy AI degree or PhD to get into AI business
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Prevents non-technical people from entering lucrative AI space
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Start with low-code/no-code tools and AI Automation Agency model
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Most people still think you need fancy degree but low-code tools democratize access

steps: Build AI systems with vector databases

actionable_quotes.quote: Holy moly, we're selling this stuff. I was just able to go onto this low code platform and whip up something in a few hours that we were charging 10 or $15,000 for when we custom coded it
actionable_quotes.context: Discovering low-code tools could deliver same value as custom development
actionable_quotes.actionability: Investigate low-code alternatives to expensive custom development

key_statistics.statistic: Low-code platforms can build in hours what took $10-15k in custom development
